mainHeading: National University of Singapore - Deep Learning Research Extern
context: Completed a 30-day research externship at NUS, involving deep learning seminars and a hands-on project focused on computer vision for workplace safety.
objectives: Led the development of SAFESCAN, a construction safety gear detection system using YOLOv8, achieving 82% accuracy on live video feeds.
Built a Flask-based real-time monitoring portal capable of processing 30 fps video to detect helmets, gloves, clothing, and shoes.
Improved safety compliance monitoring efficiency by 25% compared to baseline solutions.
